component.text: Locking Down a Router with Cisco SDM
Click through the steps to view how to complete the Cisco One-Step Lockdown process.
From the Configure tab choose the Security Audit feature.
Choose the One-step lockdown feature to perform the security action.
Be sure to click Yes to continue the security audit process. Clicking No will cancel the operation.
Once the process is complete, SDM displays a list of recommended settings. Click Deliver to send the configuration changes to the router.
The Commands Delivery Status window shows the status of delivering the commands to the router. After the configuration is delivered to the router, click OK to finish.
